Package net.sourceforge.metrics.core

Interface Summary
Constants static constants used in many places
ICalculator Public interface all calculators must implement.
IExporter interface used by classes specified in exporter extension points
 

Class Summary
Avg An Avg is a number with an associated count of the datapoints it was calculated with, as well as the associated variance.
CalculatorDescriptor Contains the specification of a calculator as contained in a plugin manifest
ExportDescriptor Contains the specification of a calculator as contained in a plugin manifest
Log Separating this from the MetricsPlugin class breaks numerous cyclic dependencies
Max A Max is a number with an associated compilation unit and (optional) selection range.
Metric Main class that holds a named calculated value and a (optional) scope, e.g.
MetricDescriptor Contains the specification of a metric as provided by a plugin manifest.
MetricsPlugin The main plugin class providing access to the metrics framework.
MetricsPreferenceInitializer To comply with Eclipse 3.0 API this class is needed to initialize the default values for the metrics preferneces.
Sum Only needed to distinguish a pure metric from a propagated one
